title: How should I read an English newspaper so that I can understand it? - Quora

response.answer_text: Take a newspaper which has simple English at least at the first phase .Then sit down with the newspaper along with a red or blue pen.Read the newspaper thoroughly and underline the difficult words or phrases which you can't understand .Then search those meanings in a dictionary or simply google it.Select some important news in the beginning and deal with them.After chalking out the meaning of the words note them down and it shall be an addition to your vocab.

Dear, simply read it at first stage don't really bother to understand for comprehension takes time and its a gradual process as well. Just go for a few healthy readables such as the editorials or ideas page and after going through it once try figuring out the meanings of the unknown words/ phrases and finally do read it with all your attention and concentration; you will surely excel well if you keep continuing.
